to have a pleasant journey/Bon voyage!

Ping'an Li (street name in Beijing)

Silent Night (Christmas carol)/Christmas Eve

May you have peace year after year (New Year's greeting)
fish brings heat, meat brings phlegm, vegetables and tofu keep you healthy
pinyin: yu2 sheng1 huo3 , rou4 sheng1 tan2 , qing1 cai4 dou4 fu5 bao3 ping2 an1
containing_words.word: 魚生火，肉生痰，青菜豆腐保平安

sentences.english: Linda phoned me in on arrival so that I know she was safe and sound.
sentences.chinese: 琳達到達後給我打了電話，因而我知道她平安無事。

sentences.english: Securely held by a lobster clasp closure, the pendant also comes with an extender chain.
sentences.chinese: 龍蝦搭扣平安保險方便，並配有加長配飾。

sentences.english: He slaughtered the ox and the ram as the fellowship offering for the people.
sentences.chinese: 亞倫宰了那給百姓作平安祭的公牛和公綿羊。

sentences.english: You should send a message to your family, maybe they are looking forward to it!
sentences.chinese: 給您的家人報一聲平安，或許他們正在翹首企盼。

sentences.english: No lives were lost, and we could wade ashore in safety.
sentences.chinese: 人都安然無恙，我們都能平安地涉水上岸。
那一夜平安無事地過去了。

sentences.english: There we can rest at peace forever!
sentences.chinese: 在那裏我們將永遠安息在平安裏。

sentences.english: "I want to hear their voices, " she said. "I hope you're safe.
sentences.chinese: “我想聽到他們的聲音”，她說，“我希望你們平安。

sentences.english: Soft but safe Yin Shi Zu, never mind to break up with him.
sentences.chinese: 石柔只求尹祖平安無恙，絕不介意與他分手。

sentences.english: Respectfully requests, and praying fathers come to enjoy the family size peace, prosperity.
sentences.chinese: 恭請祖宗降臨享用，並祈保合家大小平安，興旺發達。

sentences.english: How do we receive and keep the peace in Christ?
sentences.chinese: 如何領受並持守在基督裏的平安？

sentences.english: I wish all of my family will have health and safety.
sentences.chinese: 我希望我所有的家人都健康又平安。

sentences.english: There is some difference between W. P. A. and F. P. A.
sentences.chinese: “水漬險”與“平安險”是有些不同。

sentences.english: We’ll only relax when we know you’re all safe.
sentences.chinese: 我們只有知道你們都平安纔會輕鬆下來。

sentences.english: I'll have the goods covered against Free from Particular Average.
sentences.chinese: 我將爲貨物投保平安險。

sentences.english: Good tiding for Christmas and a happy new year!
sentences.chinese: 祂祝福你新年常常平安愉快。
